summary: Contoso Wireless offers a wide selection of TVs in various sizes and styles that come with the latest technology and features, including Smart TV, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, Dolby Audio sound, HD and Ultra HD resolution, a built-in digital tuner, voice control, and parental control settings. The company also offers a one year warranty on all TVs with an extended warranty option up to three years. Customers can take advantage of special offers such as a 10% discount when purchasing online and an additional 15% off when purchasing two or more TVs. Contoso Wireless also offers free delivery and installation within a certain radius of their store locations.
